title: Dotard or Rocket Man – who said what in the Trump v Kim Jong-un war of words?
content: With Kim Jong-un creatively bringing the word ‘dotard’ back into fashion in his response to Donald Trump’s speech this week at the UN, here is a look at the insults the two have been exchanging throughout this year. Can you spot which phrases come from the mouth of an outspoken, unpredictable and dangerous leader, and which come from North Korea’s Kim Jong-un?
summary:
With Kim Jong-un creatively bringing the word ‘dotard’ back into fashion in his response to Donald Trump’s speech this week at the UN, here is a look at the insults the two have been exchanging throughout this year.
Can you spot which phrases come from the mouth of an outspoken, unpredictable and dangerous leader, and which come from North Korea’s Kim Jong-un?
